column1: On [[24 January]] [[1965]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column2: a letter]] to Joan O. Falconer'''.<ref name=Marq>{{webcite
column5: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Contents:''' Replying to Falconer's letter of [[17 January]], Tolkien discusses [[Samwise Gamgee
column2: Sam Gamgee]]'s character in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name=Marq/><ref name=TB/>

column1: *'''Publication:''' Excerpts have been published in [[Mythprint (Vol.8, No.3)
column2: ''Mythprint'' (Vol.8, No.3)]] and in ''[[Tolkien and The Silmarillion]]''.<ref name=TB>{{webcite

column1: *'''Archive:''' The letter is kept at the Raynor Memorial Libraries at [[Marquette University]].<ref name=Marq/>
